means: 不同意( disagree的现在分词 )

sentence.Network_en: He raged against me for disagreeing.
sentence.Network_cn: 他因我有异议对我大发雷霆.

sentence.Network_en: I think you get some kind of satisfaction disagreeing with me.
sentence.Network_cn: 你总是不同意我的意见,这让你很满足吧.

sentence.Network_en: Some people delight in disagreeing with Everything anyone else says.
sentence.Network_cn: 有些人以在每件事上与别人意见相左为乐.

PerfectNetExp.abs: You are always disagreeing with your boss ., 你总是和老板唱反调.
in a sense , your eyes are disagreeing with your legs .在某中意义上，你的眼睛和腿部意见不统一。
despite disagreeing , Novartis said that it was unlikely to appeal .尽管持不同看法,诺华公司说,这是不可能提出上诉。

list.abs: That may be true.I disagree.　我不同意。I don't agree.
disagree... ... disagree with 和。。。意见一致跟人 disagree on 众议纷纭 disagree with 与…意见不一致（人） 不同意.
香水广告对消费者行为的影响问卷 - 知己知彼网 ... 中肯 Neutual 非常不同意 Strongly Disagree 电视 Television.
...用来描述会员对于调查各个项目的回答。采用5分制,从强烈反对(strongly disagree)到强烈赞同(strongly agree),3分为可疑(equivocal)。

entry.tran: 不同意;有分歧;意见不合
entry.def: If you disagree with someone or disagree with what they say, you do not accept that what they say is true or correct. You can also say that two people disagree .

example.ex: You must continue to see them no matter how much you may disagree with them...
example.tran: 无论你和他们之间有多大的分歧，你都得继续去看他们。

example.ex: They can communicate even when they strongly disagree...
example.tran: 即便在有很大分歧时，他们也还是能够交流。

entry.def: If you disagree with a particular action or proposal, you disapprove of it and believe that it is wrong.

example.ex: I respect the president but I disagree with his decision...
example.tran: 我尊敬总统，但我反对他的这个决定。

example.ex: I disagree with drug laws in general.
example.tran: 总的来说，我反对药品法。

entry.tran: (尤指食物)对…不适宜，使…身体不适，不合…胃口
entry.def: If a particular food or drink disagrees with you, it makes you feel unwell.

example.ex: Orange juice seems to disagree with some babies.
example.tran: 橙汁似乎不适合某些婴儿饮用。

auth_sentence.content: You are disagreeing with someone other than me.
auth_sentence.res_content: You are disagreeing with someone other than me.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: You are disagreeing with someone other than me.

auth_sentence.content: He could hear her agreeing and disagreeing, with whoever.
auth_sentence.res_content: He could hear her agreeing and disagreeing, with whoever.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He could hear her agreeing and disagreeing, with whoever.

auth_sentence.content: Why don't you try disagreeing or counter-arguing instead of attacking?
auth_sentence.res_content: Why don't you try disagreeing or counter-arguing instead of attacking?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Why don't you try disagreeing or counter-arguing instead of attacking?
